GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an single article object based in param id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET/api/articles.description: serves an array of objects sorted by created_at in descending order

exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars
exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comment objects sorted by date from the newest to oldest
